Name: Revolution Ventures

Revolution aims to transform markets by shifting power to consumers, and seeks to create significant value for companies that are attacking large, traditional industries with innovative new products and services.

We focus on seed stage as well as investing in existing companies; providing the collateral to facilitate the funding for these companies in exchange for a success fee, equity in the company is funded, or a hybrid of both. Our sector focus adjusts from time to time in accordance with changes in the capital markets.

Name: Abundance Partners
Description: Abundance Partners was founded in 2003 as an alternative investment firm based in the Union Square area of New York City.   The Firm has been an active investor in both public and private markets.  While the partners of Abundance have been involved in entrepreneurial ventures for over 30 years, the firm formally began making investments in private companies in 2007.

Name: Accion Venture Lab
Description: Accion is a global nonprofit on a mission to create a fair and inclusive economy where underserved people have quality financial choices and opportunities to improve their economic wellbeing. We are the leading early-stage investor in fintech for inclusion and experts in digital transformation with decades of experience harnessing the capital markets to deliver cheaper, more accessible, and customer-friendly solutions for the 1.8 billion people left out of, or poorly served by, the financial sector. For more than 60 years, Accion has helped tens of millions of people through our work with more than 200 partners in 63 countries.

Name: Acorn Bioventures

Name: Acorn Innovestments

Name: Activate Capital Partners
Description: Activate Capital is a growth-stage venture capital firm investing in the sustainable, resilient transformation of the global economy. Our strategy centers on the belief that large-scale, climate and technology-driven shifts are underway, transforming how we power, produce, and move economic activity. We believe that this sustainability supercycle is contributing to the widespread disruption of global economic systems and represents a generational investment opportunity to rebuild core systems and infrastructure over the coming decades. Activate partners with technology companies at their inflection point, led by exceptional entrepreneurs with ambitions to build category-defining platforms of the future.

Name: Activate Venture Partners
Description: Activate Venture Partners is an early-stage venture capital for high growth technology companies.

Name: Active Capital
Description: Active Capital is a venture firm focused on leading seed rounds to B2B and SaaS companies.

Name: Flucas Ventures
Description: Active, multi-stage, multi-sector venture capital investor. I will syndicate all deals where I have an allocation and the founder allows it. I'm also amenable to co-syndicating deals where there are synergies.

Name: Acumen America
Description: Acumen America makes early stage venture capital investments in businesses focused on tackling poverty across the United States

Name: Adapt Ventures
Description: Adapt Ventures is an early-stage venture capital firm backing audacious founders with bold visions. Verticals: Fintech, Software, Consumer, Healthcare

Name: Adjuvant Capital
Description: Adjuvant Capital is a life sciences investment firm focused on global health. We make $10-$25 million investments in ambitious companies targeting opportunities in high burden and neglected disease.

Name: Advance Ventures
Description: Advance Ventures, a Silicon Valley-based venture investment fund and venture accelerator that invests in seed and early-stage start-ups across three core sectors; Sustainability (AgTech, CleanTech & FoodTech) Communication (IoT, Mobile & Security) and Information Technology (Enterprise, Consumer Facing). Founded in 1999, Advance Ventures has consistently achieved meaningful exits with its portfolio companies across its core market sectors. Advance Ventures actively assists its entrepreneurs build great companies by dedicating significant time to each portfolio company and by leveraging our deep domain expertise in our core investment sectors. The Advance Ventures team of proven entrepreneurs, investment bankers and venture capitalists work closely with emerging growth companies through our venture acceleration group to create strategies to seize new opportunities, grow their businesses, and increase shareholder value.

Name: Black Jays
Description: Advances in technology and changes in consumer behavior present seismic opportunities for new entrants to disrupt legacy industries. At Black Jays we help passionate founders grow their startups into strong, sustainable, commercially successful enterprises. We invest early and actively support our companies as they grow.

Name: Advancit Capital
Description: Advancit Capital focuses on early-stage companies at the intersection of media, entertainment, and technology.

Name: Adventus Ventures
Description: Adventus Ventures Corp. is a small venture capitalist group with experienced executives identifying and developing medical technologies both internally and externally. It is a medical device incubator for those start up organizations who have true ideas for developing transformational technologies, but lack fund. Adventus VC not only offers seed funding, corporate financing, IPO, and venture like other VC firms but also guides and supports with their expert advice and technical assistance. The outspread industry network of the firm with expert professionals assists start ups in rapid development and smooth commercial release of new medical devices.

Name: AF Ventures
Description: AF Ventures is a consumer fund investing in emerging growth stage businesses across food & beverage, health & wellness, personal & household care, beauty and pet. We typically look for companies between $5-30M+ of topline revenue at the time of investment with fundamentally sound unit economics that allow for sustainable growth. With over 25 portfolio companies, we have deep connectivity throughout the consumer packaged goods ecosystem having been an early pioneer in the space and growing the franchise over multiple funds. For more information on AF Ventures, visit www.afventures.vc.

Name: Afore Capital
Description:
Afore Capital is a Pre-Seed VC with $300 million in AUM co-founded by Anamitra Banerji & Gaurav Jain. We support product-oriented founders building software companies at the very earliest stages. Our sweet spot is investing $1-2m+ into founders' first institutional round. We can lead this round alongside high value angels.

At Afore, we believe that before there's a company, before there's a business, there's a product-oriented founder leading by product. The products are often raw, sometimes just rough concepts requiring a lot of imagination. They are pre-traction and pre-obvious. But they come from founders with non-obvious insights and infectious ambitions.

Name: Afriglocal Vc
Description: AfriGloCal is a women-led Pre-seed/Seed stage Venture Capital firm intentionally set up towards building the African future by investing in entrepreneurs with solutions to hard problems with global perspectives. We focus on organizations leveraging cutting-edge technology towards scale, growth, and measurable impact in high-yield markets including the underserved markets. Of particular interest in our portfolio selection is the drive towards Wealth Creation, GloCal visioning, and gender-balanced representation. In return, we support our portfolio members beyond capital with networks that accelerate their footprints into new local, regional, and international markets and handshakes for follow-on investments, driven by our mission to drive profitability and sustainability of our investee companies.

Name: Liebenthal Ventures
Description:
After fielding success in both the real estate and public equity investment categories, in 2013 Liebenthal Holdings expanded to the startup/venture capital space, further diversifying our risk portfolio. At that point, Liebenthal Ventures was born. Our first investment was in LoopPay which in 15 months had a highly successful takeout to Samsung and is now Samsung Pay. We have since made 24 investments and have had two additional exits.

Our thesis is simple and makes us different from other venture firms. A particular industry is not included nor excluded from our investable mix on its face. An ingenious idea/product and a founding team with passion, smarts, and integrity would be the elements that we would consider paramount for any startup investment. Our angel/seed investments would be in the range of $25K-$500K depending on the opportunity, with the average check size being $150K.

Exits:
Loop Pay (Acquired by Samsung)
Swag.com (Acquired by Custom Ink)
Wise Telemetry (Acquired by Otodata)

Active Portfolio Companies:
Accern

Name: Alder Capital Partners

ALDER Capital Partners The Alder Group offers sophisticated private equity investment opportunities for accredited investors in various asset classes, including: Single Family Residential (SFR), Small and medium-sized operating businesses, Real estate transactional & bridge lending, Seed & Venture, High-yield, collateralized debt investments, Lending on Multifamily Residential (MFR), Specialized equipment and infrastructure JV deals, Distressed asset acquisitions & dispositions

- Single Family Residential (SFR)
- Small and medium-sized operating businesses
- Real estate transactional & bridge lending
- Seed & Venture
- High-yield, collateralized debt investments
- Lending on Multifamily Residential (MFR)
- High-yield lending on professional athlete employment contracts
- Distressed asset acquisitions & dispositions

Name: Allstate Strategic Ventures

Name: AlphablockZ

Name: Alpine 100
Description: Alpine 100 works with the top 100 new growth companies in the Silicon Slopes region near Alpine, UT. Services include: Funding sources, Venture Capital sources, Private Equity sources, coaching executives on scaling their company, representing your company to financial partners, board advisory services and helping companies grow to the next level. Companies not quite ready for financing can benefit by being coached and mentored at no cost until such time funding or financing is ready to be secured.

Name: Alta Global Ventures
Description: Alta Global Ventures is global venture capital fund supporting leading entrepreneurs from the top entrepreneur ecosystems around the world as they expand their business internationally. Alta Global invests directly into venture stage and growth stage technology companies targeting high-growth markets. Through our global partner network, Alta Global also supports seed stage companies in more than 20 countries and five continents around the world.

Name: Alta Partners
Description: Alta Partners is a venture capital firm investing in the healthcare and life sciences sector.

Name: Alter Global
Description: Alter Global is a venture capital firm investing in early-stage startups within emerging markets such as Southeast Asia, Latin America, the Middle East and Africa. Since 2015, we’ve partnered with more than 44 exceptional ventures across 24 cities. We believe in the theory of individual change, supporting high-character founders who are building not only their companies, but their communities and countries as well. We match our founders with talent, expertise, and investments from Silicon Valley and beyond.

Name: Altruis Capital
Description: Altruis Capital is a pre-seed investment firm that believes in ideas and invests in passion. Altruis Capital is made up of a group of Greater Lansing, MI individuals that believe in early stage startups and have come together to push them forward with capital and expertise. We offer capital, mentorship, and a network of people that assists founders in building their companies.

An early-stage fund and platform to matchmake A-list talent to promising seed-stage startups and invest in them to help build category-defining businesses. Contact: jai@oakhurstvc.com

Name: Aries Capital Partners
Description: Aries Capital Partners builds businesses through investment and deep expertise in strategy, finance, marketing, IT, and management.

Name: ARK Investment Management
Description: ARK Investment Management LLC (ARK Invest) holds a precision lens on thematic investing. We focus on disruptive innovation and identify themes that will enhance productivity and create wealth. ARK seeks to research and invest in technologically enabled innovation that cuts across economic sectors and changes the way our world works. Our current themes include Autonomous Technology, Robotics, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain Technology, Multi-Omics, Space Exploration, and Energy Storage.

Name: Arkitekt Ventures
Description: Arkitekt Ventures is an early stage venture fund, with a mission to improve and advance human health. We partner with exceptional founders building the next generation of Health & Bio companies.
